name: Slack - Autolayout & Interactive Components
description:
I wanted to practice with Auto Layout and Interactive components, so I redesigned parts of slack.


Unfortunately Figma is bugged with interactive components and emoji text layers, but the rest works great. Interactive components can be powerful.


Also Figma doesn't have text highlight... So you'll have to detach the chat component in order to edit the highlighted section in the component (sad face)...
